resources.string: This app requires a pressure sensor to work properly, because it computes altitude solely on the basis of pressure.

You burn about 0.17 calories for every step you climb and every stair descended burns about 0.05 calories on average. The sensor is very sensitive and registers altitude shifts every second, having that in mind, yuu should use this app only if u are moving, because if not, it will save some extra calories on your account, and you do not want to cheat yourself.
The app uses standard atmospheric pressure at 0 amsl, which may result in it showing inaccurate altitude, but the altitude change is highly accurate.
